comments.body: This looks a pretty cool feature to me. Can we document it in `TableChange`? Tell users that they can use `a.b.mapField.key` to change map type's key type, etc.

diffHunk:

        Some(field.copy(dataType = array.copy(elementType = replace(elementStruct, names, update))))

      case (names, dataType) =>
